survey_name: Personal Finance Management App Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of personal finance management apps to understand their satisfaction levels, pain points, and desired features.

questions.question_text: Which personal finance management app do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification. Mobile-friendly dropdown recommended.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice with 'Other' as an open-ended option.

script.question_text: Which personal finance management app do you currently use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current personal finance management app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current personal finance management app?

questions.question_text: What features do you use most frequently in your personal finance management app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure 'Other' includes a text field for specification.

script.question_text: What features do you use most frequently in your personal finance management app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use your personal finance management app?
questions.client_notes: Use single-choice radio buttons for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use your personal finance management app?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use a personal finance management app?
answer_options: To create and stick to a budget
To set and achieve financial goals

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current personal finance management app to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current personal finance management app to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your current personal finance management app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure sufficient text box size.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your current personal finance management app?

questions.question_text: Have you ever switched personal finance management apps? If yes, what was the primary reason for switching?
answer_options: Yes, due to lack of features
Yes, due to poor user experience
